attributes.action: David Cameron To Step Down As Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
It is about time that David Cameron considered stepping down from his position as Prime Minster. We need a Prime Minster who can turn this country around and who is in touch and understands the people of the UK.

The deficit does need to be cut but the welfare of British citizens also needs to be considered.

The UK needs a Prime Minister who cares not only for the country but for it's people.

David Cameron is completely out of touch.
